doc:
John Ashley (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Ashley_(actor) 0 John Ashley (December 25, 1934 – October 3, 1997) was an American actor, producer and singer. He was best known for his work as an actor in films for American International Pictures, producing and acting in horror movies shot in the Philippines, and for producing various television series, including The A-Team. John_Ashley ( December_25_,_1934 – October_3_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor_,_producer_and_singer . He was_best_known for his_work as an_actor in films for American_International_Pictures , producing_and_acting in horror_movies shot in the_Philippines , and for producing various_television_series , including The_A-Team .
